name: Pengiventure
description:
***FOR WEB VERSION***

The game in the web version sometimes crops the game a little weird. If you go to the settings menu on the title screen and click the full-screen button twice, it will take you to a proper full screen, fixing the weird cropping.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this game you play as one of three penguins swimming through the ocean, unable to stop collecting fish! Try to collect as many fish as you can in the one minute of time and be sure to avoid any dangerous sea critters, or your adventure may be cut short!

Feel free to comment your high score and let us know if you find the silly secret hidden within!

Game made for the K-State Spring 2022 Game Jam with the help of: Gage Sadrakula, Marissa Thurston, Kael Pavlik, and Devin Richards!

Music created using Aiva: https://creators.aiva.ai/
